column4: I see why it doenst work its trying to open the file with a space in it but it needs the %20 instead of a regular space so it wont find the file...
I dont know how to get past hat
so how to get opera to save the file and automaticlly put a %20 for all spaces or how to get linux to automatically recognize a space as %20.

it already has %20 in the filename it self, but when it tries to open from opera it tries to open it with a space instead of %20 and it doesnt find it.
